SEARCH
Module comp2013
Package comp2013.View

Interface IMusic

All Known Implementing Classes:
SnakeMusic
public interface IMusic
Utility to play music using JavaFX MediaPlayer.

  • Method Details

    • getMusic

      String getMusic()
      Gets the current url of the song playing
      Returns:
      URL of the currently playing song.

    • setMusic

      void setMusic(String url)
      Set the currently playing music
      Parameters:
      url - Location of new file to play ".mp3"

    • setLooping

      void setLooping(boolean loop)
      Sets the song to loop infinitely.
      Parameters:
      loop - True if music is looping, false to stop looping.

    • setVolume

      void setVolume(double newVolume)
      Set the volume to a specific value.
      Parameters:
      newVolume - The volume that you want to set to 0 is off. 1 is full.

    • getVolume

      double getVolume()
      Returns the current volume.
      Returns:
      Current volume of music.

    • increaseVolume

      void increaseVolume()
      Increase the volume by a fixed amount.

    • decreaseVolume

      void decreaseVolume()
      Decrease the volume by a fixed amount

    • muteVolume

      void muteVolume()
      Set the volume to 0.

    • playMusic

      void playMusic()
      Plays the currently loaded song.

    • playMusic

      void playMusic(int timeStamp)
      Overloaded function to play music from a specified timestamp.
      Parameters:
      timeStamp - Time to skip to in SECONDS.

    • pauseMusic

      void pauseMusic()
      Pause the song.

    • stopMusic

      void stopMusic()
      Stops the music from playing, disposes of the MediaPlayer
